title: How can I change my name? I am poor and cannot afford RP.
body: How can I change my summoner name?

replies.body: There is an option to change your summoner name in the store for 13900 IP. Other than that, I don't think there's any way to change it.

Guess my name is staying this. 

Trying to get enough for 9 flat cd glyphs, and 3 flat cd quints, tier 3, roughly the same price as that. 6000 for the quints, and then 7200 for glyphs, lol.
tis why we have a broken rune system.
Just ask for reports sense I wanna say thats an offensive name.
Just request teammates/enemies to report you for having an offensive name. Rito will say you have to change it and let you submit alternatives.

Since you have a specific concern about your Summoner name, you'll want to reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
